main event: A doctor at Ellington Air Force Base reported sighting a bright orange object in the sky on September 29, 1958.
interesting points: The object was described as round with a fan-shaped tail,The object was slightly smaller than a full moon but larger than any star or planet,The sighting lasted approximately 15 minutes,The object emitted no sound during the observation,The object's flight path was a continuous straight line from northeast to southwest.
sighted object: a bright orange round object with a fan-shaped tail
witness description: intelligent and observant persons including a doctor
